biotools.summary: MetMatch is a software tool for the semi-automated comparison of different LC-HRMS chromatograms of untargeted metabolomics experiments. It provides methods to correct the raw-LC-HRMS data for m/z and retention time shifts relative to one or several preprocessed reference chromatograms.

bioschemas.name: MetMatch
